document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">fit </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">them </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">seek </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">Dark </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">am </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thorough </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">fit. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">labor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">sober </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">With </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">austerer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">sweet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">abstinence </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">mine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">produce </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">purer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">food </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">them, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">succeed, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">If </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">transport </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">Aim </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: I fit for them - I seek the dark
